SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
A class that implements methods which allow CRUD operations on a given database.
AddController<T>
AddController class represents the window for adding new objects of a specified type.
Bill
A record representing a bill generated for a purchase.
BillDAO
The BillDAO class provides methods to interact with the database regarding bill entities.
Client
Represents a client entity.
ClientBLL
Business Logic Layer (BLL) class for performing operations on Client objects.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Client objects.
ClientValidator
Validator class for validating Client objects.
ConnectionFactory
A class that creates a single instance for a connection to the database.
DeleteController<T>
DeleteController class represents the window for deleting objects of a specified type.
EditController<T>
EditController class represents the window for editing objects of a specified type.
EmailValidator
Validator class for validating email addresses associated with Client objects.
Log
Represents a log utility for writing bill information to a file.
Main
 
OperationController<T>
OperationController class represents the window for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a specific type of object.
Order
Represents an order entity.
OrderBLL
Business Logic class for handling operations related to orders.
OrderController
 
OrderDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Order objects.
Product
Represents a product entity.
ProductBLL
Business Logic class for handling operations related to products.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for performing CRUD operations on Product objects.
ProductValidator
Validator class for validating Product objects.
StartController
 
Validator<T>
The Validator interface defines a method for validating objects of type T.
ViewAllController<T>
ViewAllController class represents the window for viewing all entities of a specified type in a table format.
